infos.value: I still fear for Mother and Sterne... I wonder how they're doing now.
You worry for others at a time like this?
But we will soon enter Wezette territory.
Once we do, the pursuing Fennes forces will surely give up chase.
That would be favorable, but alas...
Are you saying that Fennes intends to invade Wezette!?
With Hourne joined in alliance, it is not implausible.
There is much ground we must yet cover before reaching Wezette Castle to the north.
That much is apparent from the lack of Wezette's guards in this area.
If our pursuers were to catch us before reaching the castle, it would be our demise.
